title: PLEASE HELP! NEED TO FIND THIS TYPEFACE FOR BRANDING JOB
content:
hi i was just wondering whether anyone knows what typeface  
swedish design studio "blooming design" uses as their logotype  
and body text type.

[http://www.bloomingdesign.se](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017043220/http:/www.bloomingdesign.se/)
author: stephmcg

comments.content: Hi..I noticed you posted this earlier. I've looked..but I'm not sure what it is either. Jan? Stephen?

Try Priva Two.

That's the result I got from [http://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017043220/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont "http://www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont")

yeah, with Priva Two, the o is not round enough and the m is not perpendicular.

still have to keep trying as i love this typeface.
the lowercase is the key..the Uppercase (BLOOMING) is pretty nondescript
The logotype looks like Scala Sans. Not sure about the text type.

The typeface is called [Rosemary Samuels](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017043220/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/samuelstype/rosemary-samuels/) – by Swede [Hans Samuelson](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017043220/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Hans%20Samuelson).
Wow, a very good typeface, thanks Florian!

What is the larger BLOOMING? It is narrower than Rosemary Samuels and the G is different.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017043220im_/http:/typophile.com/files/blooming_4607.png)

EDIT ..... is that what was IDed earlier as Priva Two? It looks a lot more geometric.
Thanks. Just realised seventy7 had ID'd it.
That Rosemary Samuels is a nice type.
